backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, habits, habit records, and authorization with CRUD operations and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, profile loading, error states, and routing to dashboard or setup.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Collapsible panel wrapping the HabitManager with UI toggle controls.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that captures runtime errors and renders a fallback.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI card for fatal errors with reload and retry actions.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Scrollable habit grid with preserved horizontal scroll, month-scoped records, and inline completion/amount editing.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI and logic for creating, editing, and deleting habits with validation and unit handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with user info and a logout dropdown.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Calculates and displays monthly target totals for applicable habits based on records and steady-climb rules.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Renders a horizontal tab list for selecting months with clamped parsing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form to set and save the user's name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Generates monthly progress pie chart, per-habit progress bars, and daily trend chart using computed stats.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard composing header, habit manager, targets, grid, and charts with month switching and data loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreserveHorizontal: Tracks and restores horizontal scroll position for a mounted element across re-renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for jsPDF.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses humanâ€‘readable durations into seconds, formats seconds into strings, and validates duration input.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames for reports based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for converting, labeling, and identifying habit unit types.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates CSV export content from habit data and triggers CSV downloads.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Provides helpers to extract UTC date components, convert date ranges, and format UTC dates.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes habit report statistics, including percentages, daily stats, and volume metrics for a given date range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Supplies monthly Steady Climb workout targets and resolves targets for specific habit names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues, features, and requirements for maintaining daily tracking scroll position.
